response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to significantly impact and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. This product, while valued at $800,000 to us, offers unparalleled capabilities and benefits that could greatly contribute to your success. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000, aiming to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 750000}
